text: Hey!

no EEG response to painful stimuli, hot or cold.

Yeah. I couldn't stop. Why couldn't I stop?

Molly.
Hey.

I love you.

You don't want them to see you?

Thank you.
See, the irony here is,
you're kind of fascinating.
So many questions.
But if you could answer any of them,

I get it. You're a little nuts, aren't you?
Your wife is the one getting you through this.
Your wife and me.
Although, frankly, the MRI was a lot more useful than four hours of hand holding.
I think.
If he had a wife, he'd know it matters.
You're a good guy. Easy to talk to.

Your patient is seizing.
Why would he have a seizure?
Because he has cancer. His brain stem is compromised.
Why are you still arguing with this guy? You thought I was dead.
Welcome back. And nicely played.
You almost died, exactly as we planned.
You knew this was gonna happen?

Let him. Let him.

Found you a late Victorian corset.

I decided to accept your resignation.
Uh, I thought we were past this. I decided to stay.
No, you didn't, you had it decided for you.
So now you're stuck here with a boss

Which means you're no longer motivated to impress me.
Which means you're no longer motivated to come up with good ideas.
Unless I'm wrong.
Save the cheerleader, save your world.

What's going on?
Hey, just curious.

You wouldn't do that.
Yeah, I wouldn't do that.

You guys are friends?

The mind is like a muscle.
If you don't exercise it, it'll atrophy, just like anything else.

Not sure if I do.
Jeez, you're my doctor.

Kutner.
